projects.title: NEU EXPO
projects.subtitle: Northeastern University Exhibition Center
projects.description: Managing comprehensive curtain wall packages for Northeastern University's new Exhibition Center. This project involves coordinating EWA-2, EWA-3, and EWA-5 packages with complex unitized curtain wall systems featuring high-performance glazing and aluminum framing.
projects.scope: Complete facade package management including design-assist, procurement, fabrication coordination, and installation oversight for a 150,000 sq ft educational facility.
projects.challenges: Coordinating multiple curtain wall packages simultaneously while maintaining strict educational facility schedules and performance requirements. Managing complex logistics in dense urban Boston environment.
projects.solutions: Implemented digital tracking systems and AI-driven automation for material delivery coordination. Developed comprehensive progress trackers achieving 100% completion on EWA-5 with improved variance metrics.

projects.title: FNB Tower
projects.subtitle: FNB Financial Center Tower
projects.description: High-rise curtain wall installation for FNB Financial Center Tower in Pittsburgh's central business district. Managing stick-built and unitized glazing systems across 25 floors with advanced structural glazing techniques.
projects.scope: Full-scope curtain wall management including vendor coordination, RFI tracking, schedule management, and quality control for commercial high-rise office tower.
projects.challenges: High-rise installation logistics, wind load considerations, tight urban site constraints, and coordination with 5+ trades. Material delivery timing critical for continuous vertical progress.
projects.solutions: Coordinated with procurement teams to improve material delivery reliability by 15%. Facilitated multi-trade coordination to resolve field conflicts and maintain workflow continuity.

specifications.systemType: Hybrid Stick-Built and Unitized Curtain Wall

projects.title: FM Global Headquarters
projects.subtitle: Corporate Campus Facade System
projects.description: Complex facade system for FM Global's corporate headquarters featuring integrated curtain wall, ribbon windows, and architectural panel systems. Comprehensive project management across design-assist, procurement, and installation phases.
projects.scope: Multi-building corporate campus with diverse facade systems requiring extensive coordination between design, engineering, and construction teams. Managing heat-strengthening tests and quality control protocols.
projects.challenges: Complex architectural vision requiring integration of multiple facade systems. Stringent corporate standards for performance and aesthetics. Coordination across multiple building phases.
projects.solutions: Collaborated with design and engineering teams during design-assist phase to address constructability challenges. Conducted EDTM SG2700 heat-strengthening tests across multiple panels with comprehensive reporting and documentation.

specifications.systemType: Multi-System: Unitized Curtain Wall, Ribbon Windows, Panel Systems
